attributes.description: NISSAN MOVING MOUNTAINS!!!!  This awesome 2019 Nissan Micra 900T Acenta Plus Tech has a striking interior boasting with orange and black finishes. The cabin also features a leather steering wheel as well as a leather shift lever and leather hand brake which is very nice as it is soft to the touch. The D-shape steering wheel is thick and allows for a good grip and the gear lever is sporty looking. Additionally it also features daytime running lights, front power windows, a manual aircon, cruise control, automatic headlights, six airbags and much more. Driving quality in this model is excellent. Cornering is also effortless, the Acenta Plus Tech handles beautifully through corners and doesn’t feel unsettled at all. Movement over the bumps is also very smooth. The Micra Acenta Plus Tech model features Apple CarPlay and Android Auto compatibility via its 7-inch touchscreen. Safety features include rear parking sensors, rain-sensing wipers, auto-folding side-mirrors, ABS (Anti-lock Braking System) with EBD (Electronic Brake-force Distribution) six airbags, hill start assist, blind Spot Warning and Intelligent Forward Emergency Braking. Overall this hatchback is so comfortable and convenient and very economical. Full Dekra condition and roadworthy report. Price does not include dealership fees and smash and grab.
